name: Dad not Dead
description:
Your father decides you must finally become a man. In order to do that, you need to build a house, but since you're just a boy, he will be building the house. You know how 'smart' your father is, so you need to prevent him from killing himself and help him finish the house without driving him mad.

This game was created during Global Game Jam 2019 in Innopolis University.

Our team:

  • Ilshat Fatkhullin — Gameplay Programming, Art
  • Vladislav Smirnov — Sound Design, Art, UI Programming, Voice
  • Peter Zakharkin — Gameplay Programming, Art
  • Jameel Mukhutdinov — Sound Mastering, Art

We are currently studying Computer Science at Innopolis University in Russia.
